original_title: Liebte der Osten anders? - Sex im geteilten Deutschland
overview: This is about sex. About sex in Germany and who, on which side of the Iron Curtain, was better at it. At the end of the Second World War, Germans shared the same culture, lifestyle, morals. But four decades later, everything had changed. Forty years of division left their mark in many placesâ€”including the beds of the German people.
title: Do Communists Have Better Sex?
